exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure with flexible program, shutter-priority auto, aperture-priority auto, manual, exposure bracketing enabled, exposure compensation (-2.0 EV - +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV) enabled
weight: Approx. 194 g (6.9 oz) (including battery and SD memory card)
chargingtime: Approx. 1 h 50 min (when using Charging AC Adapter EH-71P and when no charge remains)
speed: 1/2000-1 s 1/2000-60 s (when ISO sensitivity is set to 80-400 in M mode) 1/4000 s (maximum speed during high-speed continuous shooting)
ioterminal: Micro-USB connector HDMI micro connector (Type D) (HDMI output)
hdmioutput: Can be selected from Auto, 480p, 720p, and 1080i
continuousshooting: Single (default setting), Continuous H (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 10 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is about 10), Continuous L (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 1 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is about 200), Pre-shooting cache (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 15 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is 20, including a maximum of 5 frames captured in the pre-shooting cache), Continuous H:120 fps (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 120 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is 60), Continuous H:60 fps (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 60 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is 60), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16, Intvl timer shooting
monitor: 7.5 cm (3-in.), approx. 921k-dot (RGBW), wide viewing angle TFT LCD with anti-reflection coating and 6-level brightness adjustment
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12 (included) AC Adapter EH-62F (available separately)
wirelesslanstandards: IEEE 802.11b/g (standard wireless LAN protocol) ARIB STD-T66 (standard for low power data communication systems)
selftimer: Can be selected from 10 s and 2 s
focallength: 5.1-25.5 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 24-120 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
flashexposurecompensation: In steps of 1/3 EV in the range between -2 and +2 EV
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 103.0 x 58.3 x 32.0 mm (4.1 x 2.3 x 1.3 in.) (excluding projections)
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 30 cm (1 ft) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity Macro close-up mode: Approx. 2 cm (0.8 in.) (at a wide-angle zoom position) to infinity (All distances measured from center of front surface of lens)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG, RAW (NRW) (Nikon's own format) Sound files (voice memo): WAV Movies: MOV (Video: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, Audio: LPCM stereo)
focusareaselection: Target finding AF, face priority, manual (spot), manual (normal), manual (wide), subject tracking
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
framecoverageplaybackmode: Approx. 100% horizontal and 100% vertical (compared to actual picture)
shootingmodes: Auto, Scene (Scene auto selector, Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum , Fireworks show, Black and white copy, Backlighting, Easy panorama, Pet portrait), Special Effects, P, S, A, M, User settings
framecoverageshootingmode: Approx. 100% horizontal and 100% vertical (compared to actual picture)
storagemedia: Internal memory (approx. 56 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 480 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
imagesensor: 1/1.7-in. type CMOS; approx. 12.76 million total pixels
isosensitivitystandardoutputsensitivity: ISO 80-3200 ISO 6400, Hi 1 (equivalent to ISO 12800) (available when using P, S, A or M mode) Hi 2 (equivalent to ISO 25600) (available when using High ISO monochrome in special effects mode)
